item.title: 004-2022-622-Goblin_Cave
item.description: Summary We interogate the remaining goblin and free the prisoner who turns out to be [[Sildar]] and learn about the map the [[DnD/World/People/Gundrin_Rockseaker]] had to the [[Wave_Echo_Cave]].
